title: The rise of Kyoshi
creator: Yee, F. C
description: Product Description An instant  USA Today  and  New York Times  bestseller!  F. C. Yee’s  The Rise of Kyoshi  delves into the story of Kyoshi, the Earth Kingdom–born Avatar. The longest-living Avatar in this beloved world’s history, Kyoshi established the brave and respected Kyoshi Warriors, but also founded the secretive Dai Li, which led to the corruption, decline, and fall of her own nation. The first of two novels based on Kyoshi,  The Rise of Kyoshi  maps her journey from a girl of humble origins to the merciless pursuer of justice who is still feared and admired centuries after she became the Avatar.

Based on the television series Avatar, the last airbender as seen on Nickelodeon TV
